entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 02:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -29.0°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -32.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
